Enumeration Type Documentation

enum lsm_data_type

What type of data structure we have

Enumerator:
LSM_DATA_TYPE_UNKNOWN 

Unknown

LSM_DATA_TYPE_NONE 

None

LSM_DATA_TYPE_ACCESS_GROUP 

Access group
